news_list.title: Berkshire Hathaway employee wins $1 million in Warren Buffett's March Madness bracket challenge - CNBC
news_list.description: The 94-year-old Oracle of Omaha was finally able to give out the big prize after relaxing the rules multiple times since the competition's inception in 2016.

news_list.title: How the rich use insurance to invest in private credit without steep tax bills - CNBC
news_list.description: Private credit is a hot asset class but comes with hefty income taxes. Top earners can save on tax with specific insurance policies known as PPVA and PPLI.

news_list.title: Tesla has flirted with disaster before. This time feels different. - Business Insider
news_list.description: Many assumed Elon Musk's proximity to Donald Trump would be a net positive. Insiders said Musk's political entanglements represent an identity crisis.

news_list.title: The tech industry is souring on Trump - Business Insider
news_list.description: Even conservative executives are fed up with tariffs, DOGE, and "crypto bro schemes"

news_list.title: Chinese AI start-ups overhaul business models after DeepSeek’s success - Financial Times
news_list.description: The country’s top groups are re-evaluating their strategies as they race to remain competitive

news_list.title: The FBI launched a task force to investigate Tesla attacks - The Verge
news_list.description: The FBI announced a task force to investigate attacks targeting Tesla.
